prompts.name: IT Infrastructure Upgrade Proposal
prompts.description: This template is for drawing up a plan to upgrade your IT infrastructure. Swap {{current issues}} with existing limitations or problems, {{upgrade solutions}} with planned improvements, {{cost estimations}} with your budget for the project, and {{implementation timeline}} with your projected timeline for completion.
prompts.content: Prepare an IT infrastructure upgrade proposal that addresses the {{current issues}}, outlines our {{upgrade solutions}}, provides a breakdown of {{cost estimations}}, and provides a feasible {{implementation timeline}}. Desist from including sensitive data or information relating to internal limitations.

prompts.name: Cybersecurity Framework
prompts.description: This blueprint is used to establish a robust cybersecurity framework. Substitute {{threat evaluation}} with your company's analysis of potential risks, {{protection strategies}} with your cybersecurity methods, {{incident response plan}} with your cyber attacks response strategy, and {{training programmes}} for educating employees about cybersecurity.
prompts.content: Develop a foolproof cybersecurity framework detailing an in-depth {{threat evaluation}}, demonstrating {{protection strategies}}, explaining our {{incident response plan}}, and endorsing {{training programmes}} to ensure company-wide awareness. Be mindful not to divulge specifics of security vulnerabilities or internal software weaknesses.

prompts.name: Data Governance Policy
prompts.description: This template assists in creating an effective data governance policy. Replace {{data handling protocols}} with procedures for managing and utilising data, {{privacy obligations}} with data privacy requirements, {{quality control measures}} with checks for data integrity, and {{review and update processes}} with methods for maintaining the policy.
prompts.content: Craft a comprehensive data governance policy encompassing established {{data handling protocols}}, strict adherence to {{privacy obligations}}, rigorous {{quality control measures}}, and regular {{review and update processes}}. Be sure not to include any proprietary information or confidential client data.

prompts.name: Software Development Plan
prompts.description: Use this structure to put together a software development plan. Substitute {{project scope}} with the goals of the software development, {{development stages}} with the process and stages of development, {{expected outcomes}} with the anticipated software capabilities, and {{evaluation criteria}} with key performance indicators.
prompts.content: Compile a software development plan centred around a clear {{project scope}}, expertly phased {{development stages}}, functionality-rich {{expected outcomes}}, and stringent {{evaluation criteria}}. Avoid sharing sensitive codes, proprietary algorithms, or undisclosed feature specifics.

prompts.name: Technology Investment Proposal
prompts.description: This template is built to hash out a technology investment proposal. Replace {{investment need}} with the justification for the tech investment, {{proposed tech solutions}} with your suggested tools or systems, {{financial considerations}} with estimates of costs and ROI, and {{implementation timeline}} with the rollout plan.
prompts.content: Detail a technology investment proposal laying out the {{investment need}}, putting forward {{proposed tech solutions}}, acknowledging {{financial considerations}}, and including a realistic {{implementation timeline}}. Abstain from any mention of unsecured funding, tentative contracts, or unofficial price quotes.

prompts.name: IT Service Management Strategy
prompts.description: This template aids in developing an IT service management strategy. Substitute {{service objectives}} with your goals for providing IT services, {{process improvements}} with planned enhancements to service operations, {{performance measures}} with metrics for service evaluation, and {{review frequency}} with how often you will reassess the strategy.
prompts.content: Construct an IT service management strategy underlining distinct {{service objectives}}, incorporating proposed {{process improvements}}, implementing robust {{performance measures}}, and committing to a regular {{review frequency}}. Avoid including confidential client details or strategies not fully agreed upon by key stakeholders.

prompts.name: IT Disaster Recovery Plan
prompts.description: This blueprint is for creating an IT disaster recovery plan. Replace {{risk assessment}} with your evaluation of potential threats, {{critical assets and responsibilities}} with prioritised technology and roles, {{recovery strategies}} with plans to restore the IT system, and {{test and update schedule}} with your plan for rehearsing and updating the recovery plan.
prompts.content: Sketch an IT disaster recovery plan that includes a thorough {{risk assessment}}, identifies {{critical assets and responsibilities}}, presents efficient {{recovery strategies}}, and schedules {{test and update cycle}}. Don't disclose specific system vulnerabilities or sensitive details of previous IT issues.

prompts.name: Data Protection Policy
prompts.description: Use this template to strategize a data protection policy. Change {{data categories}} with types of data being collected, {{storage and security measures}} with how the data is protected, {{access control}} with rules for data accessibility, and {{data breach protocols}} with procedures in the event of a data security issue.
prompts.content: Formulate a robust data protection policy grouping different {{data categories}}, illustrating secure {{storage and security measures}}, governing {{access control}}, and setting out stringent {{data breach protocols}}. Exclude confidential client-specific data or proprietary security technology.

prompts.name: Cloud Migration Strategy
prompts.description: This template assists in designing a cloud migration strategy. Substitute {{migration objectives}} with your aims for cloud transition, {{migration stages}} with a timeline of the conversion process, {{risk mitigation}} with plans to handle potential issues, and {{post-migration plan}} with a strategy for the post-transition phase.
prompts.content: Map out a cloud migration strategy conveying clear {{migration objectives}}, planned {{migration stages}}, embodied {{risk mitigation}}, and a comprehensive {{post-migration plan}}. Make sure not to reveal any sensitive data related to our IT infrastructure or detailed timelines that may inform competitors.

prompts.name: AI and Machine Learning Initiative
prompts.description: This structure builds an AI and Machine Learning initiative. Replace {{AI goals}} with your objectives for implementing AI, {{machine learning applications}} with your intended uses of machine learning, {{implementation roadmap}} with a timeline for rollout, and {{success metrics}} with indicators for evaluating the initiative's performance.
prompts.content: Compose an AI and Machine Learning initiative presenting the envisioned {{AI goals}}, potential {{machine learning applications}}, a feasible {{implementation roadmap}}, and reliable {{success metrics}}. Carefully avoid anything that could be construed as confirmation of unproven technological capabilities or unrevealed proprietary algorithms.
